title: Per-pane Claude configuration on spawn
description: Allow panes to specify custom Claude Code configuration on spawn, including model selection, context limits, and other Claude settings. This enables fine-grained control over Claude instances per-pane, supporting use cases like mixed Haiku/Sonnet/Opus agents, custom context limits, and specialized configurations.
user_impact: Enables cost optimization (Haiku for simple tasks), specialized agents (Opus for architecture), and flexible multi-agent workflows. Users can create heterogeneous agent configurations within a single ccmux session.
